entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 7:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
